00052 volatile sig_atomic_t sigterminate;
00053 
00054 void catchterminate(int sig)
00055 {
00056   sigterminate = 1;
00057   fprintf(stderr, "... catched signal - terminate minimization\n");
00058   signal(sig, catchterminate);
00059 }

00064 static struct {
00065   int maxsteps;
00066   const Interaction* Int;
00067   int par;
00068   const Constraintod* Const;
00069   int nconst;
00070   Para* q;
00071   Parameterization* P;
00072   SlaterDet* Q;
00073   SlaterDet* Qp;
00074   SlaterDetAux* X;
00075   SlaterDetAux* Xp;
00076   gradSlaterDetAux* dX;
00077   gradSlaterDet* dH, *dHd, *dHp, *dNd, *dNp;
00078 } Min;

00082 static void copyxtopara(const double* x, Para* q)
00083 {
00084   int i;
00085   for (i=0; i<q->n; i++)
00086     q->x[i] = x[i];
00087 }

00089 
00090 void MinimizeDONLP2par(const Interaction* Int, int par,
00091                        const Constraintod* Const, int nconst,
00092                        Parameterization* P, Para* q,
00093                        int maxsteps)
00094 {
00095   // handler for INT and TERM signals
00096   signal(SIGINT, catchterminate);
00097   signal(SIGTERM, catchterminate);
00098 
00099   Min.maxsteps = maxsteps;
00100   Min.Int = Int;
00101   Min.par = par;
00102   Min.Const = Const;
00103   Min.nconst = nconst;
00104   Min.q = q;
00105   Min.P = P;
00106   Min.Q = (SlaterDet*) malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00107   Min.Qp = (SlaterDet*) malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00108   Min.X = (SlaterDetAux*) malloc(sizeof(SlaterDetAux));
00109   Min.Xp = (SlaterDetAux*) malloc(sizeof(SlaterDetAux));
00110   Min.dX = (gradSlaterDetAux*) malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDetAux));
00111   Min.dH = (gradSlaterDet*) malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00112   Min.dHd = (gradSlaterDet*) malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00113   Min.dHp = (gradSlaterDet*) malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00114   Min.dNd = (gradSlaterDet*) malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00115   Min.dNp = (gradSlaterDet*) malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00116 
00117   Min.P->ParainitSlaterDet(q, Min.Q);
00118   Min.P->ParainitSlaterDet(q, Min.Qp);
00119   initSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Min.X);
00120   initSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Min.Xp);
00121   initgradSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Min.dX);
00122   initgradSlaterDet(Min.Q, Min.dH);
00123   initgradSlaterDet(Min.Q, Min.dHd);
00124   initgradSlaterDet(Min.Q, Min.dHp);
00125   initgradSlaterDet(Min.Q, Min.dNd);
00126   initgradSlaterDet(Min.Q, Min.dNp);
00127 
00128   // regular program execution or catched signal ?
00129   if (!setjmp(env))
00130     FORTRAN(donlp2)();
00131 
00132   copyxtopara(FORTRAN(o8xdat).x, Min.q);
00133 }

00136 void FORTRAN(ef)(const double* x, double* fx)
00137 {
00138   complex double hd, hp, nd, np;
00139 
00140   if (sigterminate)
00141     longjmp(env, 1);
00142   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
00143   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
00144   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Min.Q, Min.Q, Min.X);
00145   nd = Min.X->ovlap;
00146 #ifdef MPI
00147   calcHamiltonianodmpi(Min.Int, Min.Q, Min.Q, Min.X, &hd);
00148 #else
00149   calcHamiltonianod(Min.Int, Min.Q, Min.Q, Min.X, &hd);
00150 #endif
00151   copySlaterDet(Min.Q, Min.Qp);
00152   invertSlaterDet(Min.Qp);
00153   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Min.Q, Min.Qp, Min.X);
00154   np = Min.X->ovlap;
00155 #ifdef MPI
00156   calcHamiltonianodmpi(Min.Int, Min.Q, Min.Qp, Min.X, &hp);
00157 #else
00158   calcHamiltonianod(Min.Int, Min.Q, Min.Qp, Min.X, &hp);
00159 #endif
00160   *fx = (hd+Min.par*hp)/(nd+Min.par*np);
00161 
00162   FORTRAN(o8cnt).icf++;
00163 }

00165 
00166 void FORTRAN(egradf)(const double* x, double* gradf)
00167 {
00168   complex double hd, hp, nd, np;
00169   complex double H, N;
00170 
00171   if (sigterminate)
00172     longjmp(env, 1);
00173   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
00174   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
00175   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Min.Q, Min.Q, Min.X);
00176   calcgradSlaterDetAuxod(Min.Q, Min.Q, Min.X, Min.dX);
00177   calcgradOvlapod(Min.Q, Min.Q, Min.X, Min.dX, Min.dNd);
00178 #ifdef MPI
00179   calcgradHamiltonianodmpi(Min.Int, Min.Q, Min.Q, Min.X, Min.dX, Min.dHd);
00180 #else
00181   calcgradHamiltonianod(Min.Int, Min.Q, Min.Q, Min.X, Min.dX, Min.dHd);
00182 #endif
00183   hd = Min.dHd->val;
00184   nd = Min.X->ovlap;
00185 
00186   copySlaterDet(Min.Q, Min.Qp);
00187   invertSlaterDet(Min.Qp);
00188   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Min.Q, Min.Qp, Min.X);
00189   calcgradSlaterDetAuxod(Min.Q, Min.Qp, Min.X, Min.dX);
00190   calcgradOvlapod(Min.Q, Min.Qp, Min.X, Min.dX, Min.dNp);
00191 #ifdef MPI
00192   calcgradHamiltonianodmpi(Min.Int, Min.Q, Min.Qp, Min.X, Min.dX, Min.dHp);
00193 #else
00194   calcgradHamiltonianod(Min.Int, Min.Q, Min.Qp, Min.X, Min.dX, Min.dHp);
00195 #endif
00196   hp = Min.dHp->val;
00197   np = Min.X->ovlap;
00198 
00199   H = hd+Min.par*hp;
00200   N = nd+Min.par*np;
00201     
00202   zerogradSlaterDet(Min.dH);
00203   addmulttogradSlaterDet(Min.dH, Min.dHd, 1.0/N);
00204   addmulttogradSlaterDet(Min.dH, Min.dHp, Min.par* 1.0/N);
00205   addmulttogradSlaterDet(Min.dH, Min.dNd, -H/(N*N));
00206   addmulttogradSlaterDet(Min.dH, Min.dNp, -Min.par*H/(N*N));
00207   
00208   Min.P->ParaprojectgradSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.dH, gradf);
00209   FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf++;
00210   fprintf(stderr, "step %3d: \tE = %8.3f (%8.3f) MeV\n", 
00211           FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf, hbc*creal(H/N), hbc*creal(hd/nd));
00212 }

00215 void FORTRAN(eg)(int* i, const double* x, double* gxi)
00216 {
00217   if (!strcmp(Min.P->name, "FMD")) {
00218     *gxi = x[(*i-1)*NGAUSS+APOS];
00219   }
00220 }

00224 {
00225 }

00227 
00228 #define SQR(x) ((x)*(x))
00229 
00230 void FORTRAN(eh)(int* i, const double* x, double* hxi)
00231 {
00232   if (sigterminate)
00233     longjmp(env, 1);
00234 
00235   // First Constraint is CM constraint
00236   if (*i == 1) {
00237 
00238     Constraint* cnst = &ConstraintCM;
00239 
00240     copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
00241     Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
00242     calcSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Min.X);
00243   
00244     cnst->me(Min.Q, Min.X, hxi);
00245 
00246   } else {    
00247 
00248     Constraintod* cnst = &Min.Const[*i-1];
00249 
00250     complex double nd, np;
00251     complex double med[cnst->dim], mep[cnst->dim];
00252     double expme[cnst->dim];
00253     int j;
00254 
00255     copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
00256     Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
00257     calcSlaterDetAuxod(Min.Q, Min.Q, Min.X);
00258     nd = Min.X->ovlap;
00259     copySlaterDet(Min.Q, Min.Qp);
00260     invertSlaterDet(Min.Qp);
00261     calcSlaterDetAuxod(Min.Q, Min.Qp, Min.Xp);
00262     np = Min.Xp->ovlap;
00263   
00264     cnst->me(Min.Q, Min.Q, Min.X, med);
00265     cnst->me(Min.Q, Min.Qp, Min.Xp, mep);
00266 
00267     for (j=0; j<cnst->dim; j++)
00268       expme[j] = (med[j] + Min.par* mep[j])/(nd + Min.par* np);
00269 
00270     if (cnst->dim==1)
00271       *hxi = expme[0];
00272     else {
00273       double hctcr = 0.0;
00274       for (j=0; j<cnst->dim; j++)
00275         hctcr += SQR(expme[j]);
00276       *hxi = sqrt(hctcr);
00277     }
00278 
00279     *hxi -= cnst->val;
00280   }
00281 }
00282 
00283 
00284 void FORTRAN(egradh)(int* i, const double* x, double* gradhi)
00285 {
00286   if (sigterminate)
00287     longjmp(env, 1);
00288 
00289   // First constraint is CM constraint
00290   if (*i == 1) {
00291     Constraint* cnst = &ConstraintCM;
00292 
00293     copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
00294 
00295     Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
00296     calcSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Min.X);
00297     calcgradSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Min.X, Min.dX);
00298     zerogradSlaterDet(Min.dH);
00299     cnst->gradme(Min.Q, Min.X, Min.dX, Min.dH);
00300     Min.P->ParaprojectgradSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.dH, gradhi);
00301     fprintf(stderr, "\t\t\t\t\t%4s = %8.3f\n", 
00302             cnst->label, cnst->output(Min.dH->val));
00303   } else {
00304     Constraintod* cnst = &Min.Const[*i-1];
00305 
00306     complex double nd, np, hd, hp;
00307     complex double N, H;
00308     double expme[cnst->dim];
00309 
00310     copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
00311     Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
00312     copySlaterDet(Min.Q, Min.Qp);
00313     invertSlaterDet(Min.Qp);
00314 
00315     calcSlaterDetAuxod(Min.Q, Min.Q, Min.X);
00316     nd = Min.X->ovlap;
00317     calcSlaterDetAuxod(Min.Q, Min.Qp, Min.Xp);
00318     np = Min.Xp->ovlap;
00319 
00320     N = nd+Min.par*np;
00321 
00322     if (cnst->gradneedsme) {
00323       complex double med[cnst->dim], mep[cnst->dim];
00324 
00325       cnst->me(Min.Q, Min.Q, Min.X, med);
00326       cnst->me(Min.Q, Min.Qp, Min.Xp, mep);
00327 
00328       int j;
00329       for (j=0; j<cnst->dim; j++)
00330         expme[j] = (med[j] + Min.par* mep[j])/N;
00331     }
00332 
00333     calcgradSlaterDetAuxod(Min.Q, Min.Q, Min.X, Min.dX);
00334     calcgradOvlapod(Min.Q, Min.Q, Min.X, Min.dX, Min.dNd);
00335     zerogradSlaterDet(Min.dHd);
00336     cnst->gradme(Min.Q, Min.Q, Min.X, Min.dX, expme, Min.dHd);
00337 
00338     hd = Min.dHd->val;
00339 
00340     calcgradSlaterDetAuxod(Min.Q, Min.Qp, Min.Xp, Min.dX);
00341     calcgradOvlapod(Min.Q, Min.Qp, Min.Xp, Min.dX, Min.dNp);
00342     zerogradSlaterDet(Min.dHp);
00343     cnst->gradme(Min.Q, Min.Qp, Min.Xp, Min.dX, expme, Min.dHp);
00344 
00345     hp = Min.dHp->val;
00346 
00347     H = hd+Min.par*hp;
00348     
00349     zerogradSlaterDet(Min.dH);
00350     addmulttogradSlaterDet(Min.dH, Min.dHd, 1.0/N);
00351     addmulttogradSlaterDet(Min.dH, Min.dHp, Min.par* 1.0/N);
00352     addmulttogradSlaterDet(Min.dH, Min.dNd, -H/(N*N));
00353     addmulttogradSlaterDet(Min.dH, Min.dNp, -Min.par*H/(N*N));
00354   
00355     Min.P->ParaprojectgradSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.dH, gradhi);
00356     fprintf(stderr, "\t\t\t\t\t%4s = %8.3f (%8.3f)\n",
00357             cnst->label, cnst->output(creal(H/N)), cnst->output(creal(hd/nd)));
00358 
00359   }
00360 }

00362 
00363 void FORTRAN(setup0)(void)
00364 {
00365   int i;
00366 
00367   FORTRAN(o8dim).n = Min.q->n;
00368   FORTRAN(o8dim).nh = Min.nconst;
00369   // in case of FMD parametrization use bound constraints for Re{a}
00370   if (!strcmp(Min.P->name, "FMD")) {
00371     FORTRAN(o8dim).ng = Min.q->ngauss;
00372     for (i=0; i<Min.nconst+1; i++) {
00373       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][0] = -1;
00374       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][1] = 0;
00375       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][2] = 0;
00376     }
00377     for (i=0; i<Min.q->ngauss; i++) {
00378       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][0] = 1;
00379       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][1] = i*NGAUSS+APOS+1;
00380       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][2] = 1;
00381     }
00382     for (i=0; i<Min.q->ngauss; i++) {
00383       if (Min.q->x[i*NGAUSS+APOS] < 0)
00384         Min.q->x[i*NGAUSS+APOS] = 1.0+1.0*rand()/RAND_MAX;
00385     }
00386   } else
00387     FORTRAN(o8dim).ng = 0;
00388   FORTRAN(o8stpa).analyt = 1;
00389   FORTRAN(o8stpa).cold = 1;
00390   FORTRAN(o8par).tau0 = 20.0;
00391   FORTRAN(o8par).del0 = 0.0;
00392   FORTRAN(o8stpa).silent = 1;
00393 
00394   for (i=0; i<Min.q->n; i++)
00395     FORTRAN(o8xdat).x[i] = Min.q->x[i];
00396 }

00399 void FORTRAN(setup)(void)
00400 {
00401   FORTRAN(o8stpa).te0 = 0;
00402   FORTRAN(o8stpa).te1 = 0;
00403   FORTRAN(o8par).iterma = Min.maxsteps-1;
00404 }
